    Library Ground_2_0_0

    Namespace: http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2

    • BusinessObjects 
      Name Description
      Driver
      Driver information.
      Vehicle
      Defines a specific vehicle (make, model, seats etc.)
    • CoreObjects 
      Name Description
      FlightInfo  
      CustomerCount
      A count of the number of customers in an age band.
      CustomerAgeBand
      Identifies a customer type: Adult, Senior, Infant, Child, etc
      GroundServiceQuery
      Query criteria for a Ground Service
    • ValueWithAttributes 
      Name Description
      LanguageInfo
      Language details pertaining to the service.
      Review
      Review's score from 0 to 5, where 5 is the best.
      LanguagesSpoken
      One or more languages spoken by a person. Query: could the value be a text list of the language names, with 'best practice' having the primary language alwys first? e,g English French Spanish. Or is it sufficient for the relevant api to access and display it as required?
      LicensePlate
      Offical vehicle identification.
      PassengerPrefs
      Passenger preferences including service type, physically challenged vehicle and other vehicle preferences.
      Luggage
      Quantity of luggage.
      MeetAndGreet
      Details of a meet and greet service.
    • Enums 
      Name Description
      VehicleCategory_Enum
      Size category of ground transportation vehicle - extracted from 1.0 SIZ code table
      GroundService_Enum
      Type of gound service e.g. Private, Shared or Hourly
      TransferRequests_Enum
      Additional equirements for a transfer, e.g. child seat or meet and greet service.
      DeadlineDropTime_Enum
      An enumerated type indicating when the deadline drop time goes into effect.

      Name Description
      GetGroundOffers
